title: Beautiful 3 BR townhome in a Gated Community in NLV!
map_address: 3269 Cheyenne Gardens Way near Cheyenne and Simmons
posting_body: ['Beautiful 3 bed/2.5 bath two story townhome in a Gated Community in NLV.', '1,159 sq.', 'ft. Two car attached garage.', 'NEW WOOD-LIKE TILE FLOORING ALL THROUGHOUT DOWNSTAIRS, NEW CARPET UPSTAIRS!', 'Front living room.', 'Dining area with a ceiling fan and a pantry!', 'All bedrooms are upstairs.', 'Master bathroom has a large tub!', 'Has an exterior patio area!', 'Has a Community Pool!', 'No Section 8.', 'All appliances included!', 'Pets allowed.', 'No smoking.', 'For more information on this property or to set up an appointment to view it, please call Chris at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Please reference the street name 3269 CHEYENNE GARDENS WAY when calling!', '~First United Management Group, LLC.~', 'Located at Cheyenne and Simmons.', 'License # S.0169212']
